wikipedia_page.main: John Granger (born 16 July 1899) was a Scottish footballer who played for St Mirren, Dumbarton, Celtic and Forfar Athletic.

response: John Granger is a speaker and writer whose principal focus is the intersection of literature, faith and culture. He is most well known as the author of several books analysing J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter novels. He writes a weblog called Hogwarts Professor, and contributes to podcasts on Mugglenet.
